## Overview
This project integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with real-time financial data to provide actionable crypto insights. [cite_start]Unlike standard chatbots, this system utilizes a **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** framework to ground answers in live market data[cite: 30].

## Technical Architecture
*  **Model:** LLaMA3 served via Ollama[cite: 30].
*  **Vector Database:** FAISS for vector retrieval using nomic-embed-text embeddings[cite: 32].
*  **Data Pipeline:** Aggregates real-time prices (CoinGecko API) and news (NewsAPI)[cite: 31].
*  **Deployment:** Fully containerized Streamlit application using **Docker**[cite: 33].

## Key Features
1.  **Sentiment Analysis:** Applies NLTK to financial news to gauge market sentiment[cite: 31].
2.  **Technical Indicators:** Auto-calculates RSI, MACD, and Bollinger Bands[cite: 31].
3.  **Forecasting:** Integrated TensorFlow/Keras LSTM for short-term price prediction[cite: 32].
